InfraredPacket.receivedBuffer: The raw buffer of data received
InfraredPacket.receivedNumber: The first number in the payload.
InfraredPacket.receivedNumbers: The array of numbers of received.
network.infraredPacket: Get most recent packet received over IR.
network.infraredSendNumber: Send a number over the infrared transmitter.
network.infraredSendNumbers: Send an array of numbers over infrared. The array size has to be 32 bytes or less.
network.onInfraredError: Run action after there's an error reciving packet over IR.
network.onInfraredPacket: Run action after a packet is recieved over IR.
network.onInfraredReceivedBuffer: Run some code when the infrared receiver gets a buffer.
network.onInfraredReceivedNumber: Run some code when the infrared receiver gets a number.
network.onInfraredReceivedNumbers: Run some code when the infrared receiver gets a list of numbers.
